The entertainment website 8satire: com published the original satire article titled "Man Rushed To Hospital After Eating 413 Chicken Nuggets," which was falsely presented as a genuine news story.
The claim can be traced back to a previo: which falsely reported a man going into a coma after eating 413 Red Lobster Biscuits, not chicken nuggets. This story was mistakenly taken as real by some media outlets.
